PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-12462022-11-25,  ECCC,  PARKS,  ,  ,  , 
ActHeritage Railway Stations Protection Act
SubjectOrder Authorizing VIA Rail Canada Inc. to make Alterations its Railway Station in Halifax, Nova Scotia
PrecisOrder authorizing VIA RAIL CANADA INC. to make alterations to its railway station located at 1161 Hollis Street, Halifax, Nova Scotia in order to repair, restore, and replace various elements of the station’s exterior, including the station’s main façade and portions of the roof, in a way that preserves the station’s heritage character.
AttachmentsAttachment
